Backoff - Interface in io.github.josephmeghanathd.backoff
Strategy interface for calculating the wait duration between retry attempts.

N

NanoRetry<T> - Class in io.github.josephmeghanathd
NanoRetry is a lightweight, high-performance retry library designed specifically for the Virtual Thread era (JDK 21+).
nextDelay(int) - Method in interface io.github.josephmeghanathd.backoff.Backoff

W

withBackoff(Backoff) - Method in class io.github.josephmeghanathd.NanoRetry
Configures the backoff strategy to determine the delay between retries.

Sets a timeout for each individual attempt.
withTimeout(Duration) - Method in class io.github.josephmeghanathd.NanoRetry
